instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Chrome app . At the bottom right, tap More and then Settings . Tap Privacy and then Clear Browsing Data . Check Cookies, Site Data . Uncheck the other items. Tap Clear Browsing Data and then Clear Browsing Data . Tap Done .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Chrome app . To the right of the address bar, tap More Settings . Under "Advanced," tap Site settings . Tap the permission you want to update.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Chrome app . Go to a website. To the right of the address bar, tap More Info . Tap Site settings . To make a change, under "Permissions," tap a setting. If you don't see a "Permissions" section, the site doesn't have any specific permissions.
